header_text: You've been feeling run down lately and cancel on plans that you made with your friends. Your friends express frustration, saying that they planned this a long time ago and were looking forward to seeing you. You think that you made the best decision for yourself.

elements.Text: Are you glad you canceled your plans to rest?
